revisions.rev:
{{Infobox person | name = Beans Balawi | birth_name = Beans El-Balawi | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1997|6|24|df=y}} | birth_place = [[United Kingdom|U.K.]] | othername = | occupation = [[Actor]], [[Chorister]] | years_active = 2004âpresent }} '''Beans Balawi''' (born 24 June 1997) is an English actor and [[chorister]]. He began acting in 2004 with roles in ''[[Seed of Chucky]]'' and ''The Happiness Thief'', ''[[Half Light]]'' (2006) and ''[[28 Weeks Later]]'' (2007). Recently Beans has played roles as Jamie Keenan in ''[[Holby Blue]]'' and as Freddy Macey in ''[[Lark Rise to Candleford (TV series)|Lark Rise to Candleford]]''.
He attended Garden Suburb Junior School [Westminster Abbey Choir School, singing in the [[Westminster Abbey]] Choir.
==Filmography== ===Films=== *''[[King Arthur (film)|King Arthur]]'' ([[2004 in film|2004]]) as Lancelot's Younger Brother (uncredited) *''[[Seed of Chucky]]'' ([[2004 in film|2004]]) as Human Glen *''The Happiness Thief'' ([[2004 in film|2004]]) as Timmy ([[short film]]) *''[[Half Light]]'' ([[2006 in film|2006]]) as Thomas Carlson *''[[28 Weeks Later]]'' ([[2007 in film|2007]]) as Boy in Cottage *''[[The History of Mr Polly]]'' ([[2007 in film|2007]]) as Young Polly ([[television movie]])
==TV appearances== *''[[Life Begins]]'' ([[2004]]-[[2005]]) as Freddie (10 episodes) *''[[Holby City]]'' ([[2005]]) as Ben Townsend (1 episode) *''[[Holby Blue]]'' ([[2007]]) as Jamie Keenan (2 episodes) *''[[Lark Rise to Candleford (TV series)|Lark Rise to Candleford]]'' ([[2008]]) as Freddy Macey (1 episode)
